resources.string:
Welcome to Timesheet!

 To start, add some tasks to Timesheet. Tasks can be billable tasks such as "Project Documentation" or unbillable tasks such as "Lunch". Use the "Add Task" menu option to add a task.
 
 After tasks have been added, click on a task to select it as the current task. The checkbox shows which task you are currently working on. Selecting a new task will close out the current one and start the new task. Selecting the current task will close it out without starting a new one.
 
 To get a report of hours, use the "Time List" menu option to get a report of time by day or by week.
